title: Fragment, late 17th–early 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: raised needle lace
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border fragment of Gros Point de Venise in a large floral and foliated serpertine design. Pattern outlined by cordonnet and connected by brides picotées and interspersed by portes and gaze quadrillée.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 17th–early 18th century.
late 17th–early 18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: raised needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-231.
